Articles.Content:
So I have this rocket (link below) and it uses radial decouplers to make big explosions. The thing is, I added 3 more of the RD to each SRB and they somehow, even though they're in the same stage, fire just when I start the engines. So first click, fires all except added ones. Second click, fires the rest and starts engines up.

Fair warning, when flying the Super Rocket 2, make sure to have SAS on and over throttle it.
That's odd. I got it to work by attaching another fuel tank to the last liquid fuel stage.

ITS MAH FIREWORKS, AND I WANT IT NOW!

(cheap commercial ref.)
